title: Sneak peek: Hunt teases variable, deeper carbon Aerodynamicist Tri/TT wheels to race the clock
content:
What does the next generation of Hunt Bike Wheels’ aerodynamic Aerodynamicist carbon wheels look like? Blunt-nosed & deep, but condition-specific aero profiles that vary from front to rear in both width and depth.  We got a sneak peek today at Hunt’s upcoming triathlon and time trial wheels. The new Hunt Aerodynamicist wheels are about to

The post Sneak peek: Hunt teases variable, deeper carbon Aerodynamicist Tri/TT wheels to race the clock appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
